siteDescription: Software developer testing Next.js, playing at having a "pOrTFoliO and bLoG", in case it makes them smarter. It doesn't
blogDescription: A collection of "Might be useful later" pieces, code snippets, "Gotchas" & "How to's" for quick reference. Not a blog, just me mumbling in the corner to myself.
